contentrichtext.text: {{Orphan|date=February 2009}} '''Youcan''' is a musician and singer song writer in [[Kyoto]], [[Japan]]. His voice is very thin, melting into air, but it includes strong inner message. Usually he plays in solo style with his [[guitar]]. At the same time, he has some units with which he can show anothor his musical side. ==Discography== *Hikari (1st album) *Waikiki March (Compilation album) *Synjuku meeting '03 (Compilation album) *WORDS+WORTH (Compilation album) ==External links== *[http://akaruiheya.moonlit.to/ Youcan official site] in Japanese *[http://www.waikikirecord.com/ waikikirecord] record label to which Youcan belongs {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Youcan | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese singer-songwriter | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} [[Category:Japanese musicians]] [[Category:Living people]]
